fields.description:
DEVSERVICE-52127
DEV: 21h; CR: 2h; INT: 2h; ACC: 8h; PROD: 10h;

QA: INT: 10h; ACC: 1h; PROD: 1h;

NOTE: There is another development task to be approved:[https://support.transporeon.com/browse/EI-6183]. Should the same developer be assigned? As reference: previous developer for the main implementation task was Filip.

This task is priority. We expect the developer to start with this one first.

===========================



The goal of this task is to integrate with camera system and external monitor, which is managed by third party company "Lotraco", therefore we will connect to it via API.

[https://api.tscsandbox.com/_doc/index.html?urls.primaryName=TSC+v3]

We will use Drylock username and password, which must be stored on our side.

API Test URL:[https://api.tscsandbox.com|https://api.tscsandbox.com/]

API Tenant: drylock

API User:[api@timeslotcontrol.com|mailto:api@timeslotcontrol.com]

API Password: It will be shared with developer

In attachment there is the system specification with each API connection detail and mapping.



The connection requires a token which should be get on the following call:

POST /v3/\{tenant}/Token

From the response we will get the Token.



We need to call different objects according to the following logic:
 * *1)* On Booking Creation
 ** POST: /v3/\{tenant}/Reservations
 ** Response will be Reservation ID. Must be saved on the booking extension "booking.reservation.id"
 ** The booking reservation ID will be used for all other connections
 ** Field mappings in attached PDF


 * *2)* On Booking Update
 ** PUT: /v3/\{tenant}/Reservations/\{id}
 ** {id}= reservation.id

* 
** 
*** Only send this request when updated data include at least one of the following fields:
**** KFZ
**** trailer.number
**** DockNo
**** Field mappings in attached PDF


*3)* On Dispatch Status Set Update WHEN Status "ACTIVATED" is set and the Booking Extension "DockNo" is also set
* 
** PUT: /v3/\{tenant}/Reservations/\{id}/CustomAction/\{customActionId}
** \{id}
= reservation.id

* 
** \{customActionId}= f81299bb-2b82-41f4-b75f-cd848cf3f369 (fixed value)

* 
** Only send this request when:
*** Status dispatch.status.activated and Booking Extension DockNo are set;
*** or
*** Booking Extension DockNo is set and Status dispatch.status.activated was already set before;
** Field mappings in attached PDF


*4)* On Booking Delete
* 
** DELETE: /v3/\{tenant}/Reservations/\{id}
** \{id}
= reservation.id

 * 
 ** Field mappings in attached PDF



NOTE: All API calls should be valid only for specific locations, which will be maintained on a MD table: ""

comments.body:
[~ottokar.elgeti@transporeon.com] Hi, I had to create new task as I could not change the dates anymore, I have no idea why.

Please check this task instead. I will close the other. Thank you
Development done and deployed on Int. CR pending.

#1 
Please check transport JJ2019254, I created a booking and the export failed
f30d3c9b-fefc-01eb-b259-c78c62a2eb77
#1 deployed on Int

#1 
I still get a NullPointerException
bcce1236-8275-6edf-a18f-38d86beb4d68

#1 deployed on Int.
Please note that on Int there will always be an exception when testing the WS outbound, since we wont get an answer. I fixed it to first log the request so you can verify the content, but after that we will still have an exception until we get to Acc and have an answer.

#1 PASSED

#2
Adding following fields should trigger an update export message, but it seems to trigger an activation message
KFZ
trailer.number
DockNo (when status activate in not set)
Example  85d5172d-8e70-67f7-f328-d32aca3ad633 ( added trailer )
#3 Do we export a body for deletion? I cannot find it in the mapping
#3 Deletion does not take a body, only the reservationsID in the URL

#4
It seems that the existing process for "Booking export" is not triggered (to SAP) . The booking export should be available for all locations and the additional export via API only when the location is in table booking_ws_locations.
Example transport without booking export: 1339906
#2, #4 deployed on Int

#1 PASSED
#2 
After entering KFZ no export was triggered
After entering Dock no event "Activate Booking WS export" was triggered, but only with https://api.tscsandbox.com/v3/drylock/Reservations/112233
There is no Body. I am not sure if we have an event Update Booking, at the moment this is never triggered.
#3 PASSED
#4 still no booking export to SAP
#4 another example transport 2027338

#2 After entering KFZ no event is triggered, according to Ottokar it is a configuration issue. [~joao.monteiro@transporeon.com] Can you please check?
#4 It seems that the OB does not have the carrier number/creditor number anymore. Was there any update on the OB creation?
Another example 1232766 
As discussed with Ottokar this seems to be the reason why no booking export was triggered.
#5 Status ACTIVATED + dock no triggers update export *and *PUT: /v3/{tenant}/Reservations/{id}/CustomAction/{customActionId}, but the update should not be triggered, e.g. 41355113-f8ae-8080-375d-a4eaf6f16f93
#6 noticed that on ACC we have several event with blank description:
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!

#5 deployed on Int
#2, #4, #6 for Joao to check first.

Hi,

#2 What you mean it is a configuration issue?

#4 Well, is this the normal behavior of the platform? No carrier id is associated with OB unless we force it?

#6 Also in PROD, it seams is when we receive STATUS from SAP, but system found more than OB because no booking id is sent on the request.

Hi Joao
#2 Ottokar mentioned that XP does not get any event, so it seems to be an tsmconfig issue
#4 Transport is assigned to a carrier, so OB should have the carrier id. Please check the example.
#6 Do you mean we have bookings for loading and unloading? How should we proceed here?

#5 PASSED
Only #2, #4, #6 are open

Hi,



#2 added missing booking extension. Should work now. Let me know please.

#6 I have sent info to customer, to see if he can change. However, from our side, [~ottokar.elgeti@transporeon.com] can you put a name to it like "Import Dispatch Status"?



Thank you

#4 we found the issue, some code from the other task is already in INT, and that is causing the issue.

Query: 
 * Table: *carrier_creditor_mapping_OB_creation*
 * Condition: \{"scheduling_unit":{"id":1158122,"name":"Buccinasco","standard":false},"shadow_carrier_creditor_number":"200027"}

Result:
 * null


There is no mapping defined for carrier creditor number and scheduling unit.

Example in INT: a9282abb-8d1b-6ebb-b65e-3cb9827ca683

#2 is still open, no event is triggered when entering KFZ, see example JJ2019254 
Export was triggered after entering Trailer number

#4 FIXED

#2 + #6 open
#6 on Int now
#6 FIXED

#7 Can you please check Nullpointer on ACC
49ffd90a-3642-f323-c8e5-1b36e0fbca9f

#7 We need some input from the customer here. This error exists because when requesting a token we get an error back without a body. In this case I need input from the customer on what caused this. The request was send to https://api.tscsandbox.com/v1/drylock/Token. The body is not logged since it contains the credentials.

Hi Colleagues,

#7. I wrote to the customer. I will keep you posted.

BR

Janusz

Hello Otto,

#7. I got a feedback from the customer.

"{_}Hello Janusz,{_}

_you seem to be sending a wrong request._

*_please verify that the authorization was successful (a valid JWT token was generated)._*

{_}If the token is valid you need to insert it into the authorization header of the next requests{_}."

It looks like a TOKEN was created but we did not use it with the request of the booking creation.

Could you check it again, please?

Thanks
Janusz

Only FYI:

Already clarified with Otto. It should be fixed by tomorrow morning.

I also tested it using POSTMAN and I received correct response:

!image-2025-04-22-15-38-39-135.png!
#7 deployed on Int. Please provide an UR, since this can't be tested on Int

Hi Otto,

There is still an error in XP.

I tested it using POSTMAN.

It looks that the request is not built correctly.

We have now:

{
"ExtCustomFieldVarchar1": "1303878659",
*"ExtCustomFieldComboBox1": "",*
"ReservationNumber": "TESTJAN123",
"ExtCustomFieldVarchar3": "F3 DRYLOCK HIGH BAY Expedition / Outbound",
"ExtCustomFieldVarchar4": "Expedition - 3.3",
"NumberOfUnits": 1,
"ResourceId": "CBCCAE08-CA39-4A26-8959-155A445012A2",
*"Start": "2025-04-17 15:00",*
"UnitId": "446db9bf-64c9-4ada-9f17-d7cefdaebccb",
"TrailerNumberPlate": "",
"VehicleNumberPlate": ""
}

But the one that worked is:
{
"ExtCustomFieldVarchar1": "1303878659",
"ReservationNumber": "TESTJAN123",
"ExtCustomFieldVarchar3": "F3 DRYLOCK HIGH BAY Expedition / Outbound",
"ExtCustomFieldVarchar4": "Expedition - 3.3",
"NumberOfUnits": 1,
"ResourceId": "CBCCAE08-CA39-4A26-8959-155A445012A2",
"Start": "2025-04-17T15:00",
"UnitId": "446db9bf-64c9-4ada-9f17-d7cefdaebccb",
"TrailerNumberPlate": "",
"VehicleNumberPlate": ""
}
I have set my request according to what is [https://api.tscsandbox.com/_doc/index.html?urls.primaryName=TSC+v3]
What I have changed?
- I removed *ExtCustomFieldComboBox1*
- Date time format was adjusted. I added only T but it would be good to have it set with right time zone
Next step/changes in the code:
a. Do not add field *ExtCustomFieldComboBox1* to the request when there is no value
b. Adjust date time structure to the one correct one (including time zone)
c. Extend XP log and add the error description returned by by the customer system (in postman everything was clear what I have to do with the request)

Thank you and BR
Janusz

#8

Hello Otto,

I was just informed by PitOPS that they whitelisted the url.

But when I tried to test I got an error which can be found here 90b64b7a-8be3-2900-0e7d-26e5b9a26e4f.

The error is here:

  at com.transporeon.exchange.masterdata.DataServiceFacade.getSize(DataServiceFacade.java:161)
  at com.transporeon.exchange.customer.drylocktechnologiesnv.bookingws.LocationChecker.isRelevantLocation(LocationChecker.java:22)

Location id: 615009012 (F3 DRYLOCK HIGH BAY Expedition / Outbound) is in the XP table booking_ws_locations

Could you check it please?

Once it is solved I will continue testing.

BR

Janusz
